page.title: 18Stoolball.
page.content: Stoolball is played by {two teams} of not more than eleven players. Each team has a captain who shall toss for the choice of first innings.. There is a wicket at each end. The wickets are the face and edges of two boards which shall be 300 mm. (1 ft.) square. The bat is 460 mm. (18 ins.) in length and must not be more than 200 mm.(7 3/4 ins.) in diameter. An approved stoolball is used. It weighs between 55 g. and 70 g. The boundary is 40 m. (45 yds.) from the wickets. Wickets are 15 m.(16 yds.)apart. In Eastbourne there are 64 {mixed {teams} in {eight leagues}. Teams are usually 6 men & 5 women who bowl alternately. A man and woman bat and are replaced by another player of the same sex when they are dismissed.
